root_causes: Consecutive losses: 9 in a row suggests no regime filtering or poor exit strategy
High SL hit rate (68%): stops too tight or entry timing poor
Single large loss (2.1%): position sizing issue or no circuit breaker
Low win rate (42%): strategy likely trading against regime or entry signals are noisy
Poor R:R ratio (1.07): TP too close or SL too wide
Low Sharpe: inconsistent returns or high volatility
Poor trade quality: low win rate AND low expectancy
Insufficient trades: filters too strict or low signal quality
ranked_fixes: Priority 1: Tighten regime filter (raise ADX threshold from 25→28, ATR to 55th pct)
Priority 1: Increase cooldown from 3→6 bars to avoid revenge trading
Priority 1: Add circuit breaker: halt if rolling DD > 4%
Priority 2: Raise entry thresholds (+15-20% on breakout/volume filters)
Priority 2: Add regime gating if not present
Priority 3: Increase decision threshold (0.55→0.62) for higher confidence trades
Priority 3: Add session filter to avoid low-liquidity hours
Priority 3: Loosen filters slightly (reduce breakout threshold by 5-10%)
Priority 3: Check if cooldown is too aggressive
